sources.title: The Cactus Kid (1935) JACK PERRIN
sources.description:
Stars: Jack Perrin, Fred Humes, Philo McCullough
Director: Harry S. Webb

A cowboy has a burning desire for justice and revenge when he is framed for the murder of his pal.

metadata.Plot: After Jack and Jimmy get paid for delivering horses, Jimmy rides off to pay the hands. Plug Perkins gets Cheyenne to kill him but Cheyenne leaves a plate from his harmonica at the scene. Jack finds the plate and catches up with Cheyenne just as Perkins is about to shoot him. After saving Cheyenne's life, he has a plan that will trick Cheyenne into a confession.
metadata.Actors: Jack Perrin, Fred Humes, Philo McCullough
